title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate embeddings, and stream responses with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via a proxy.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration for Ollama; plug local models into LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat UI, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs with POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli-rs
summary: Fast, interactive Rust CLI for Ollama with fuzzy model search and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama server, CUDA runtime, and WebUI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama; use local models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tuning, function-calling, multimodal, and edge-deployment examples.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that streams Ollama responses with session memory.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI reminiscent of ChatGPT-CLI but powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Llama 3 for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama REST API with decorators and dependency injection.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for starting/stopping Ollama and switching models from the tray.

title: ollama-terraform-provider
summary: Experimental Terraform provider to manage Ollama models and configurations as code.
